name: process_constructions_unfinished_attic

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedattic
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the attic

arguments.name: selecteduains
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic insulation type

arguments.name: selecteduaceilroof
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic ceiling or roof insulationFor manually entering unfinished attic ceiling or roof insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedceilroofinsthickness
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic ceiling or roof cavity insulation thickness

arguments.name: userdefineduaceilroofr
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic ceiling or roof cavity insulation R-value

arguments.name: selecteduaceiljoistthickness
arguments.display_name: Thickness of joists in the ceiling

arguments.name: userdefineduaceilff
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic ceiling framing factor

arguments.name: selecteduaroofframethickness
arguments.display_name: Thickness of joists in the ceiling

arguments.name: userdefineduaroofff
arguments.display_name: Unfinished attic roof framing factor

arguments.name: selectedrigidins
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation of roof cavityFor manually entering rigid insulation properties of roof cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsthickness
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation thickness of roof cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsr
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation R-value of roof cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedhasradiantbarrier
arguments.display_name: Roof has radiant barrier

arguments.name: selectedgypsum
arguments.display_name: Interior finish  of cavityFor manually entering interior finish properties of cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedgypthickness
arguments.display_name: Thickness of drywall layers

arguments.name: userdefinedgyplayers
arguments.display_name: Number of drywall layers

arguments.name: selectedroofmat
arguments.display_name: Roofing material for unfinished atticFor manually entering roofing material properties of unfinished attic, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatthermalabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material emissivity of unfinished attic

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material absorptance of unfinished attic

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of constructions for the unfinished attic floor and ceiling. Finds surfaces adjacent to the unfinished attic and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates constructions for the unfinished attic floor and ceiling.
